projects.name: Zolochiv association of volunteers
projects.description: Zolochiv is a district center in the Lviv region. At the beginning of the full-scale invasion, volunteer organizations started forming in the Zolochiv district. However, acting independently wasn't proving to be productive, so the decision was made to unite these volunteer organizations. I received a request to create a website for this collaboration from the Junfolio team I joined.
